title: [BUG]
body:
**Describe the bug**
unable to copy paste in redis-cli
A short description of the bug.

**To reproduce**

Steps to reproduce the behavior and/or a minimal code sample.

**Expected behavior**

A description of what you expected to happen.

**Additional information**

Any additional information that is relevant to the problem.

comments_data.body: Would you mind leaving a little bit more of a description for the behavior you are expecting?
Copy pasting _does_ work in redis-cli tho?

@kumarvadivel copy paste is a feature of the terminal emulator, not the cli application in this case.
please describe which platform / OS you're using, which version and exact steps to reproduce your problem.

closing.
please feel free to re-open and/or post more details.
